name: BlockUI
description: BlockUI can either block other components or the whole page.

fullscreen.label: fullscreen
fullscreen.title: When enabled, the whole document gets blocked.

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: block
events.title: Fired when the element gets blocked.

events.name: unblock
events.title: Fired when the element gets unblocked.
